Package Lubomski_WGU_C195.DAO

Class CustomerDAO

java.lang.Object
Lubomski_WGU_C195.DAO.CustomerDAO
public class CustomerDAO extends Object
Data Access Object for handling customer related database operations. Provides methods to import, add, update, and delete customers, and to check for customer appointments.

    • customerImportSQL

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> customerImportSQL() throws SQLException
      Imports all customers from the database. Retrieves all customer records from the database and converts them into Customer objects.
      Returns:
      An ObservableList of Customer objects.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

      Parameters:

      Throws:

    • deleteCustomer

      public static boolean deleteCustomer(int customerID) throws SQLException
      Deletes a customer from the database. Removes the customer record by using the customer ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      customerID - The ID of the customer to delete.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the deletion was successful.
      Throws:
      SQLException - If a database access error occurs.

    • customerHasAppointments

      public static boolean customerHasAppointments(int customerId)
      Checks if a customer has any appointments. Queries the database to determine if the customer, using the customer ID has any appointments.
      Parameters:
      customerId - The ID of the customer to check for appointments.
      Returns:
      A boolean indicating whether the customer has appointments.
